content.html: The only times I've been motivated in my career was when I was building a product I was excited about and/or used in my personal life prior to accepting the job. Having a personal stake in the game really improved my morale.
content.value:
The only times I've been motivated in my career was when I was building a product I was excited about and/or used in my personal life prior to accepting the job.

Having a personal stake in the game really improved my morale.
